name: PetVivo Holdings, Inc.
description: PetVivo Holdings, Inc. is an emerging biotechnology company focused on the development and commercialization of innovative products for the veterinary market. Founded in 2016 and headquartered in Minneapolis, Minnesota, PetVivo is dedicated to improving the quality of life for animals through advanced medical technologies. The company's flagship product, Kvet, is a novel therapeutic device designed to treat osteoarthritis and other joint-related conditions in dogs and cats. Kvet utilizes a proprietary, injectable polymer that mimics the natural synovial fluid found in healthy joints, helping to alleviate pain and improve mobility in affected animals. PetVivo's mission is to provide veterinarians with superior solutions to enhance animal health and wellness. The company is actively engaged in research and clinical studies to expand its product offerings and ensure that its therapies are safe and effective. As a forward-thinking organization, PetVivo is committed to leveraging cutting-edge scientific advancements to develop therapies that address unmet needs in the veterinary space. With a growing portfolio of intellectual property and a focus on collaboration with veterinary professionals, PetVivo aims to establish itself as a leader in the animal health market.
